- [ ] Verified Boot
- [ ] Wi-Fi
- [ ] Bluetooth
- [ ] Camera
- [ ] Sound
- [ ] Biometrics - fingerprint / face unlock
- [ ] Flashlight / torch
- [ ] GPS
- [ ] Hotspot
- [ ] NFC
- [ ] Calls
- [ ] Text Messages / SMS
- [ ] Mobile data
- [ ] VoLTE
- [ ] Wi-Fi Calling
- [ ] Quickly go through logs to make sure there's no obvious crashes / missing libs / etc
